channel.title: MavensMate Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 0.1 beta (Initial release)
item.description:
Initial Release

MavensMate.app is meant to run in the background and respond to requests from clients for operations like creating new projects, compiling metadata, or running unit tests.

Currently, the only text editor with a MavensMate plugin is Sublime Text. To download the MavensMate plugin for Sublime Text, click here
